entities: United Nations Office for West Africa (UNOWA)
reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports every 90 days until 30 June 2013
summary:
19. UN bodies in Côte d'Ivoire and Liberia are called upon to enhance support for the stabilization of the border area.

20. ECOWAS and the Mano River Union are encouraged to develop a subregional strategy to address cross-border threats.

21. The recommendation to transfer three armed helicopters from UNMIL to UNOCI is endorsed.

22. The Secretary-General is requested to submit a special report by 31 March 2013, assessing the situation in Côte d'Ivoire and providing recommendations on benchmarks, UNOCI's structure, and inter-mission cooperation.

23. The Secretary-General is requested to provide a midterm report by 31 December 2012 and a final report by 30 June 2013.

24. The Security Council decides to remain seized of the matter.
